summary: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice is a 2024 dark fantasy comedy horror film directed by Tim Burton. It is a sequel to the 1988 film, Beetlejuice, with Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder, and Catherine O'Hara reprising their roles. The story follows Lydia Deetz, now a mother, who encounters the specter Betelgeuse again as she struggles with family issues. After years of development, the film was finally made with a new cast, including Justin Theroux and Jenna Ortega. It was well-received by critics and did very well at the box office, becoming one of the highest-grossing films of 2024.
title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
